page.title: 09A DAY IN THE LIFE OF MY MUM
page.content: My Mums day begins at some unearthly time like 6:30am when she comes downstairs and makes our breakfast.For me and my sister,she just puts out cereal but for my dad she makes an egg,toast and a pot of tea.Then at 8:15, she goes into Pannal where she is a lollipop lady outside Pannal school.She crosses the children whilst her stick tells the traffic to wait.She gets home about 9:15.She then washes up,hoovers or dusts the house and if she has time she might watch a video or something.Then she will have a snack lunch then begin to get tea ready.We usually have mince,shepherds pie or pizza.When I come in,after walking home,my tea is nearly ready, I sit in front of the T.V.and eat my tea.My mum also watches T.V.,she likes soap operas and mysteries best.
